summary: So basically this mod just turns Jarl balgruuf into a monster
descriptionHtml:
So i was thinking of making a mod when my friend decited that he want's Jarl balgruuf to be the highking, and then this master piece came to life.

STORY:
Jarl Balgruuf drank some weird mead and it turned him into a purple, ugly, elf, giant who is now the highking of skyrim.
LoreFriendly.exe
author: KhairKhajiit
